name: Attack Boost
description: Increases attack power.

name: Agitator
description: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

name: Peak Performance
description: Increases attack when your health is full.

name: Resentment
description: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).

name: Resuscitate
description: Increases attack power when you are suffering from an abnormal status.

name: Critical Eye
description: Increases affinity.

name: Critical Boost
description: Increases the damage of critical hits.

levels.description: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 30%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 35%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 40%.

name: Weakness Exploit
description: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.

levels.description: Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity.
Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity.
Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity.

name: Latent Power
description: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.

levels.description: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Maximum Might
description: Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time.

name: Critical Element
description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

name: Master's Touch
description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

levels.description: Grants a 20% chance of no sharpness loss while active.
Grants a 40% chance of no sharpness loss while active.
Grants an 80% chance of no sharpness loss while active.

name: Fire Attack
description: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Water Attack
description: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Ice Attack
description: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Thunder Attack
description: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Dragon Attack
description: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Poison Attack
description: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Poison buildup has a maximum limit.)

name: Paralysis Attack
description: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Paralysis buildup has a maximum limit.)

name: Sleep Attack
description: Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Sleep buildup has a maximum limit.)

name: Blast Attack
description: Increases the rate of blast buildup. (Blast buildup has a maximum limit.)

name: Handicraft
description: Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.

name: Razor Sharp
description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness.

name: Spare Shot
description: Bow and bowgun shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

name: Protective Polish
description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

name: Mind's Eye
description: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.

levels.description: 50% chance of your attacks not being deflected. (+10% damage to hard targets when activated).
100% chance of your attacks not being deflected. (+15% damage to hard targets when activated).
100% chance of your attacks not being deflected. (+30% damage to hard targets when activated).

name: Ballistics
description: Extends the range in which ammo and arrows have maximum power.

name: Bludgeoner
description: Increases attack power when your weapon sharpness is low.

levels.description: +5% attack power when your weapon sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
+10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
+10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is green or lower.

name: Bow Charge Plus
description: Increases max bow charge level by one.

name: Focus
description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

levels.description: 5% faster gauge fill rate and 5% faster charge times.
10% faster gauge fill rate and 10% faster charge times.
20% faster gauge fill rate and 15% faster charge times.

name: Power Prolonger
description: Long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades stay powered up longer.

levels.description: Slightly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
Boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
Greatly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.

name: Marathon Runner
description: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

name: Constitution
description: Reduces stamina depletion when evading, blocking, or doing certain other actions.

name: Stamina Surge
description: Speeds up stamina recovery.

name: Guard
description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

levels.description: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.
Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.

name: Guard Up
description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

name: Offensive Guard
description: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.

name: Critical Draw
description: Increases affinity for a short time after performing a draw attack. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)

name: Punishing Draw
description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)

levels.description: Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and get attack +3.
Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and get attack +5.
Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and get attack +7.

name: Quick Sheathe
description: Speeds up weapon sheathing.

name: Slugger
description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

name: Stamina Thief
description: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

name: Affinity Sliding
description: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.

name: Horn Maestro
description: Increases overall performance speed and shockwave damage.

name: Artillery
description: Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and Sticky Ammo.

levels.description: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.
Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.
Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

name: Load Shells
description: Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

levels.description: Increases ammo and coating reloading speed.
Gunlance loading capacity +1 Increases charge blade phials

name: Special Ammo Boost
description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.

levels.description: Increases power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.
Increases power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

name: Normal/Rapid Up
description: Increases the attack power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.

levels.description: Slightly increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.
Increases the power of Normal Ammo and  Rapid-type arrows.
Greatly increases the power of Normal Ammo and  Rapid-type arrows.

name: Pierce Up
description: Increases the attack power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.

levels.description: Slightly increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.
Increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.
Greatly increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.

name: Spread Up
description: Increases the attack power of Spread Ammo and Spread- type arrows

levels.description: Slightly increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.
Increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.
Greatly increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.

name: Ammo Up
description: Increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)

levels.description: Expands clip size for some ammo types.
Expands clip size for many ammo types.
Expands clip size for most ammo types.

name: Reload Speed
description: Increases bowgun reloading and bow coating loading speed.

levels.description: Bowgun speed +2. Loads bow coating automatically.

name: Recoil Down
description: Reduces recoil when firing bowgun ammo.

name: Steadiness
description: Suppresses the deviation of bowgun shots.

name: Rapid Fire Up
description: Improves light bowgun rapid fire.

name: Defense Boost
description: Increases defense. Resistances will also improve as the level increases.

name: Divine Blessing
description: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.

levels.description: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

name: Recovery Up
description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

name: Recovery Speed
description: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).

levels.description: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

name: Speed Eating
description: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.

name: Earplugs
description: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.

levels.description: Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.
Nullifies weak and strong monster roars. Reduces the effects of powerful monster roars.

name: Windproof
description: Grants protection against wind pressure.

levels.description: Negates minor and major wind pressure.
Negates minor and major wind pressure and reduces the effects of dragon wind pressure.

name: Tremor Resistance
description: Grants protection against ground tremors.

levels.description: Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

name: Bubbly Dance
description: Reduces bubbleblight and grants increased evasion when afflicted.

levels.description: Reduces the effects of major bubbleblight.
Reduces major bubbleblight to minor bubbleblight and increases evasiveness while afflicted.
Also inflicts bubbleblight when performing consecutive evasive movement.

name: Evade Window
description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

name: Evade Extender
description: Increases evade distance.

name: Fire Resistance
description: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Water Resistance
description: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Ice Resistance
description: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Thunder Resistance
description: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Dragon Resistance
description: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Blight Resistance
description: Grants protection against all elemental blights.

levels.description: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.
Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%.

name: Poison Resistance
description: Reduces damage while poisoned.

levels.description: Reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage.

name: Paralysis Resistance
description: Reduces the duration of paralysis.

levels.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

name: Sleep Resistance
description: Reduces the duration of sleep.

levels.description: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

name: Stun Resistance
description: Reduces stun duration.

levels.description: Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.
Reduces the duration of stun by 90%.

name: Muck Resistance
description: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck or deep snow.

name: Blast Resistance
description: Grants protection against blastblight.

levels.description: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

name: Botanist
description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.

levels.description: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect, or mushroom item per gather.

name: Geologist
description: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.

levels.description: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
Allows you to gather one extra time from gathering points.
Allows you to gather one extra time from mining outcrops.

name: Partbreaker
description: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of monsters.

name: Capture Master
description: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

name: Carving Master
description: Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

name: Good Luck
description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

name: Speed Sharpening
description: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

levels.description: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

name: Bombardier
description: Increases the damage of explosive items.

name: Mushroomancer
description: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.

levels.description: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
Additionally lets you digest mandragoras and exciteshrooms.

name: Item Prolonger
description: Extends the duration of some item effects.

name: Wide-Range
description: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.

levels.description: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

name: Free Meal
description: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

name: Heroics
description: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.

levels.description: While active, increases defense by 50 points.
While active, attack power +30% and defense-increasing effects are negated.

name: Fortify
description: Increases your attack and defense when you fall in battle. (Disabled for some quests. Can be activated twice.)

levels.description: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

name: Flinch Free
description: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.

levels.description: Prevents knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.

name: Jump Master
description: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.

name: Carving Pro
description: Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.

name: Hunger Resistance
description: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.

levels.description: Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 50%.
Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 100%.
Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

name: Leap of Faith
description: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.

name: Diversion
description: Increases the attention drawn when attacking a monster.

name: Master Mounter
description: Improves your Wyvern Riding skills.

levels.description: Makes filling the Riding Gauge easier and increases ease of parrying.

name: Chameleos Blessing
description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Chameleos.

levels.description: Sometimes increases the effects of Spiribirds.
Also negates minor and major wind pressure.
Also extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.

name: Kushala Blessing
description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Kushala Daora.

levels.description: Also allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.

name: Teostra Blessing
description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Teostra.

name: Dragonheart
description: Draconic energy fills you after losing a certain amount of health. Weapons lose all non-dragon effects.

levels.description: When your health is at 50% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 30.
When your health is at 50% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50.
When your health is at 70% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50.
Contract dragonblight when at 70% health or less. Sets Elemental resistances to 50 and gain +5% attack power.
Contract dragonblight when at 80% health or less. Sets Elemental resistances to 50 and gain +10% attack power.

name: Wirebug Whisperer
description: Improves your handling of Wirebugs.

levels.description: Extends the duration you can keep a Wirebug by 30%.
Also increases passive recovery rate while on the ground.

name: Wall Runner
description: Reduces stamina consumption when running on walls.

levels.description: Reduces stamina consumption by 25% while wall running.
Reduces stamina consumption by 50% while wall running.
Also temporarily increases attack power by wall running.

name: Counterstrike
description: Temporarily increases attack power after being knocked back.

name: Rapid Morph
description: Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades.

name: Hellfire Cloak
description: Grants hellfire resistance and confers explosive hellfire power to your attacks after fulfilling certain conditions.

levels.description: Inflicts hellfireblight when monsters are enraged.
Effect persists for one minute after a monster's rage has subsided.

name: Wind Alignment
description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Wind Serpent Ibushi.

name: Thunder Alignment
description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Thunder Serpent Narwa.

name: Stormsoul
description: Strengthens thunder and dragon power and improves skills of the same elements.

levels.description: Also increases level of other skills by +1.
Also increases level of other skills by +1 (stacks with previous bonus).

name: Blood Rite
description: A proportion of damage dealt is converted to health when striking a broken monster part.

levels.description: Increase the amount of health you recover
Further increases the amount of health you recover

name: Dereliction
description: Qurio will drain health, but also bolster your attacks. Multiple Qurio further bolster attacks and let you recover health when performing a Switch Skill Swap.

levels.description: Using Red Scroll: Increased elemental and status values. Using Blue Scroll: Increased attack and stun potency
Bolsters your attacks depending on which Swap Scroll is used
Further bolsters your attacks depending on which Swap Scroll is used

name: Furious
description: Using the Red Scroll builds your fury while fighting monsters. Swapping to the Blue Scroll when your fury is full gives you infinite stamina temporarily.

levels.description: Using Red Scroll: Defense+ 10, all Res+ 5 | Swap to Blue Scroll: Temporary Infinite Stamina
Using Red Scroll: Defense+ 20, all Res+ 10 | Swap to Blue Scroll: Infinite Stamina Extended
Using Red Scroll: Defense+ 30, all Res+ 20 | Swap to Blue Scroll: Infinite Stamina Extended

name: Mail of Hellfire
description: Decreases defense but increases attack. Exact changes to stats depends on Switch Skill Swap Scroll that is being used.

levels.description: Using Red Scroll: Defense down, attack up. Using Blue Scroll: Resistance down, element up
Further decreases defense and resistance, while further increasing attack and element
Greatly decreases defense and resistance, while greatly increasing attack and element

name: Coalescence
description: Temporarily enhances attacks after recovering from blights or abnormal status.

levels.description: While active, attack +12, element attack power +2, and status buildup +5%
While active, attack +15, element attack power +3, and status buildup +10%
While active, attack +18, element attack power +4, and status buildup +20%

name: Bloodlust
description: The effects of the Frenzy virus change. Health is gradually reduced, but you gain a variety of effects. Frenzy virus occurs regularly when in combat.

levels.description: While infected, attack & evasion increase & stamina use reduced
While infected, further boost to effects received. Upon recovery, further increase to affinity
While infected, further boost to effects received. Upon recovery, further increases duration of increased affinity

name: Defiance
description: Increases defense when large monsters become enraged.

levels.description: While active, nullifles weak roars, wind pressure, and tremors
While active, nullifles weak roars, wind pressure, and tremors. Reduces all strong ones, def +5
While active, nullifles weak and strong roars, wind pressure, and tremors, def +10
While active, nullifles weak and strong roars, wind, and tremors, reduces powerful roars & d.wind, def +20
While active, nullifles weak, strong and powerful  roars, wind & dragon wind, and tremors, def +30

name: Sneak Attack
description: Increases damage to large monsters when attacks hit them from behind.

levels.description: While active, increases attack power by 5%
While active, increases attack power by 10%
While active, increases attack power by 12%

name: Adrenaline Rush
description: Perform a perfectly-timed evade just as a monster attacks for a temporary attack boost.

name: Redirection
description: Perform a perfectly-timed Switch Skill Swap just as a monster attacks to reduce the damage and negate damage reactions.

levels.description: Nullifies incoming damage, and automatically performs a Swap Evade backwards which recovers Wirebug Gauge

name: Spiribird's Call
description: Receive the effects of a random Spiribird at fixed intervals. (Certain quests only)

name: Charge Master
description: When a charged attack hits a monster, the element and status buildup of the charged attack increases.

levels.description: When active, grants a slight increase to elemental damage and status buildup
When active, grants an increase to elemental damage and status buildup
When active, grants a large increase to elemental damage and status buildup

name: Foray
description: Increases attack power and affinity when attacking a large monster affected by poison, paralysis, or an elemental blight.

levels.description: While active, increases attack power +10 and affinity +10%
While active, increases attack power +15 and affinity +20%

name: Tune-Up
description: Increases the stats of custom mods attached to bowguns.

levels.description: Increases stats of Silencer and Shield. If neither are equipped, Reload Speed +1
Also increases stats of Long Barrel and Power Barrel. If neither are equipped, Reload Speed +1 and Steadiness +1

name: Grinder (S)
description: When recovering sharpness, grants a boost to sharpness properties based on the number of levels recovered.

levels.description: Effect activates for 60 seconds when sharpness recovers 3 levels
Effect activates for 60 seconds when sharpness recovers 2 levels
Effect activates for 90 seconds when sharpness recovers 2 levels

name: Bladescale Hone
description: Dodge rolling to evade an attack with your weapon drawn will recover sharpness, refill bowgun ammo, or give Close-range Coatings a temporary boost.

name: Wall Runner (Boost)
description: Wirebug Gauge recovers faster while wall running.

name: Quick Breath
description: You can remove some statuses or slow their effects by performing a Switch Skill Swap. Health recovers when a status is removed.

name: Element Exploit
description: Increases elemental damage when attacking body parts upon which the element are highly effective.

levels.description: Attacks that hit weak spots do +10% elemental damage
Attacks that hit weak spots do +12.5% elemental damage
Attacks that hit weak spots do +15% elemental damage

name: Burst
description: Continuously landing hits gradually increases attack and elemental attack. (The amount of increase depends on the weapon.)

levels.description: Upon attack hit, temp attack +5, element +5; hit 5 successive times for an extra stat boost
Upon attack hit, temp attack +5, element +5; hit 5 successive times for a large stat boost
Upon attack hit, temp attack +5, element +5; hit 5 successive times for a huge stat boost

name: Guts
description: Prevents fainting one time only when damage taken exceeds a certain amount of your remaining health.

levels.description: Activate effect when vitality is 80 or higher
Activate effect when vitality is 72 or higher
Activate effect when vitality is 64 or higher

name: Status Trigger
description: Perform a perfectly-timed evade just as a monster attacks to trigger abnormal status buildup on hit.

levels.description: While active, effect duration is 5 seconds
While active, effect duration is 8 seconds
While active, effect duration is 12 seconds

name: Intrepid Heart
description: After filling the gauge by continuously landing attacks, negates damage reactions and reduces damage taken from a single attack that would knock you back.

levels.description: When activated, damage received is further reduced and will detonate an explosion

name: Buildup Boost
description: Increases attack power when you land attacks that build poison, paralysis, sleep, blast, or exhaust. (Exhaust - ammo/phials/coatings only)

levels.description: While active, increases attack power by 10%
While active, increases attack power by 15%
While active, increases attack power by 20%

name: Embolden
description: When targeted by a monster, that monster becomes more likely to become enraged but your own defense is increased.

levels.description: While active, defense +10, slightly prolongs dodging invincibility and slightly lowers impact when guarding
While active, defense +20, slightly prolongs dodging invincibility and slightly lowers impact when guarding
While active, defense +40, slightly prolongs dodging invincibility and slightly lowers impact when guarding

name: Wind Mantle
description: Using Silkbind attacks boosts Wirebug Gauge recovery. Landing continuous attacks increases the effect. Wears off when you sheathe your weapon.

name: Powder Mantle
description: Continuously attacking a large monster will cause powder to form around you. The color and effects of the powder will change over time.

levels.description: Get sent flying when wreathed in red powder and you'll receive explosive damage. Attack when in blue for an explosive finish

name: Berserk
description: Switch to the Blue Swap Scroll and all vitality will change to red gauge and start decreasing. As long as you have red you cannot faint.

levels.description: Slows the speed at which your red gauge depletes when using the Blue Swap Scroll

name: Strife
description: Increases elemental attack and affinity in proportion to the length of your red health gauge.

levels.description: Increases attack power in accordance to gauge length
Further increases attack power in accordance to gauge length
Further increases attack power in accordance with gauge length. Max out attack for an infinite stamina effect

name: Frostcraft
description: An aura of frost builds when your weapon is sheathed, raising attack. The effect decreases with each melee hit or shot/arrow fired.

levels.description: Extends the Frost Gauge even further

name: Dragon Conversion
description: When using the Red Swap Scroll, all elemental resistance is set to 0 and converted into elemental attack. The Blue Swap Scroll raises elemental resistance.

levels.description: All elemental resistances +5. When using the Blue Swap Scroll, resistance buildup increases when continuously attacking
All elemental resistances +10. When using the Red Swap Scroll, the conversion rate for elemental attacks increases
